Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.app

Class ConfigurableApplication<ConfigT,​OS extends OperatingSystem>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.app.AbstractApplication<OS>
      • org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.app.ConfigurableApplication<ConfigT,​OS>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Application, OperatingSystemAccess<OS>, EventProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractCamSendingApp, EmergencyBrakeApp, VehicleConfigurationApp
    public abstract class ConfigurableApplication<ConfigT,​OS extends OperatingSystem>
extends AbstractApplication<OS>
    An extended AbstractApplication, which automatically loads a configuration from a json file, which is called the same as the implementing class (e.g. MyVehicleApplication.json, if MyVehicleApplication extends ConfigurableApplication).
